about_the_game:
Do You Like Exorcism?

Calling the name of the demon.
That is the essence of exorcism.
What is the identity of the demon possessing the child?
Using information about the demon's origin and rank from the list of demons recorded in the holy texts, combine logical reasoning with a bit of luck to choose the demon's name.
If you get it right, you win. If you get it wrong, you'll be cornered.

Exorcist Seeking Names V.S. Demon Seeking Sins

Up to 10 demons can invade your house, approaching to learn about your greatest sins.
You must identify which demon is possessing the child while avoiding interference.
Each play session lasts about 30 minutes, but you can enjoy the strategic back-and-forth multiple times.

Challenge Fate with Everything Given

With over 20 different "holy verses" that can be randomly obtained, you can gain various pieces of information and advantages.
Using the gathered information, identify the demon in front of you.
Even if you throw all your saved holy verses into the fight, there aren't many moments where you can be 100% sure.
There will be times when you must challenge with a success rate of 50%, 30%, or even 10%.
Pray that you're right. This is a slightly complex game of chance and a battle spiced up with some "divine intervention."
Do you like games of chance?

Holy Verses Carved as the Last Weapon

Each time you save a child, you can carve a holy verse into the cross.
This allows you to control which holy verses you can obtain to some extent, supporting your gameplay against luck.
If you save 5 children and exorcise what lies beyond the 6th door, you can leave the house of demons.

【Streaming and Broadcasting Guidelines】

We welcome game play videos from individuals and corporations, but please make sure to read and comply with the following guidelines:

・Include the game title "Exorcist: Reviewer of Minds" in the title of your videos or live streams.
・Provide a link to the store page in accessible places such as the description section.
・Monetization through features provided by video sites (advertising revenue, donations, etc.) is allowed.
・Do not include content that defames or slanders others, or that is contrary to public order and morals in your game commentary or broadcasts.
・727 NOT HOUND is not responsible for any damages or issues that arise from the commentary or broadcasting of the game.
・These guidelines may be changed without notice, and the revised guidelines will apply to videos created after the change.

short_description: Everyone must resist the relentless unfairness with the cards they've been dealt. Use the randomly distributed holy verses to identify the names of the 10 demons. Save 5 people and exorcise the sixth threat lurking in the shadows. This is a compact game of continuous gambles and judgments.
